testcase.name: User can create cluster with name "QA-cluster"
testcase.system-out:
Steps: Given cluster data ... passed When User create cluster ... passed Then Response is "202" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://127.0.0.1:8080/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters data = {"cluster": {"node_templates": {"jt_nn.medium": 1, "tt_dn.small": 1}, "name": "QA-cluster", "base_image_id": "d9342ba8-4c51-441c-8d5b-f9e14a901299"}} response = 202
202 == 202
